response.overview: Narr, a little cat, orphaned but talented, wants to complete his great painting to be recognized by all his village, but his limited resources prevent him from continuing his piece. Fortunately, he meets a mysterious being who helps him to get what he is looking for, apparently, asking nothing in return. Now Narr is obsessed with meet his goal, ignoring everything that happens around him, without knowing the price he is paying.
response.title: carmesí
